Project: Haven Realty - Real Estate Template
This file contains the licensing information for the third-party libraries 
and assets used in this project.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
copies of the Software.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Source: https://swiperjs.com/
License: MIT License
Copyright (c) 2014-2023 Vladimir Kharlampidi

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Source: https://michalsnik.github.io/aos/
License: MIT License
Copyright (c) 2015 Michal Snik

Source: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Inter

custom-generated assets included with this template. They are 
royalty-free for use within this end-product.
